Headline: #43 43rd Temporary Reroute at Root/Stewart
ShortDescription: 43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via: 43rd, Normal, and Root, due to, street blockage, near Root/Stewart.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via: 43rd, Normal, and Root, due to, street blockage, near Root/Stewart.

Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Southbound Reroute near Damen/Hastings
ShortDescription: SB 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via: Damen, Roosevelt, Ashland, 18th and Damen, due to, street blockage, near Damen/Hastings.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via: Damen, Roosevelt, Ashland, 18th and Damen, due to, street blockage, near Damen/Hastings.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
